price: 52. Hubaal, diintiinnaan (Islaamka) waa diin mid keliya ah. Aniguna waxaan ahay Rabbiigiin, ee dhowra (xilkaan idin saaray oo ka fogaada shirkiga iyo xumaha kale) .
arabic: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-ittaqūni
